dialog: i pray we get a decent sleep tonight... it's the same time every gosh darn night.
why must he use that high powered industrial grade band saw at such ungodly hours!
does he think that our ears are filled?
unbelievable! they had to go and ruin it for everyone!
christopher, it's been three years, get over it!
well, if it wasn't for her, we'd be retired by now, sipping woo-woos in belgium.
it's not the end of the world christopher, you still have customers!
yes but my supply chain has been severly limited! I can't keep wearing casts on every available limb, can I?
that's true. you look like the michelin man christopher.
and another thing, having to stare at her house every night is insulting.
you know, i swear i heard something moving around in there the other night...
i don't take cold calls, please remove my phone number from your system!
